errors.error_description: Installing pip dependencies before creating a virtual environment, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates:
python -m venv pgeu_env
source pgeu_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

python -m venv pgeu_env
pgeu_env\Scripts\activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

virtualenv pgeu_env
source pgeu_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

conda create -n pgeu_env python=3.8
conda activate pgeu_env
pip install -r requirements.txt
errors.golden_answer:
python -m venv pgeu_env
source pgeu_env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

errors.error_description: References requirements.txt file that may not exist in the repository
correction_candidates: pip install django psycopg2-binary celery redis
